title: Oretachi wa Abunakunai ~ Cool ni Saboru Keijitachi
overview: Two young detectives are looking forward to the future. Takano Shin is looking forward to being promoted and spends his time studying for promotions and utilizing in-house politics. Yonaka Wataru is busy with job hunting. Though they confront the numerous crimes in the city, they don't work overtime, push themselves or even investigate.Â
